page.title: 13HOME LIFE IN LYNEHAM
page.content: I LIVE IN A TERRACED HOUSE WITH MUMMY AND DADDY AND MY BROTHER PHILLIP. MY DADDY IS IN THE R.A.F. AND MY MUMMY MAKES MY BED AND DOES ALL THE WORK. MY DADDY GOES TO WORK AT THE CAMP. GARETH RAYBOULD 7YRS. MY DADDY WORKS ON CAMP, HE FIXES THE HERCULES PLANES AND THEY ARE GREY. ZOE SCOTT 6YRS. I AM CALLED CAROLINE HUFTON AND I AM 6YRS.OF AGE . MY DADDY WORKS IN THE R.A.F. AND MY MUM WORKS AT THE PUB AND I LIKE IT AT SCHOOL I HAVE A PET DOG CALLED "BEN" I LIKE HIM. I LIKE LYNEHAM I WENT TO SEE THE BAKERS SHOP AND THE BETTING SHOP. THERE IS A THATCHED COTTAGE IN LYNEHAM AND IT IS 100 YRS. OLD.LYNEHAM IS A GOOD PLACE TO LIVE. CLAIRE BROWN 6YRS.
